PR# : {{ doc.name }}
{% if doc.items[0].purchase_order %} PO#: {{ doc.items[0].purchase_order }} {% endif%}


Purchase Receipt

Supplier Name : {{ doc.supplier }}   Recevied Date : {{ doc.posting_date }}
Warehouse : {{ doc.items[0].warehouse }}  


{% for item in get_pr_items(doc.name) %} {% endfor %}
Sr Barcode Image Item Name RetailSKU Qty Item Location To Deliver SOs
{{ loop.index }} {{ item.item_name }} {% if item.ifw_retailskusuffix %}{{ item.ifw_retailskusuffix }}{% endif %} {{ item.qty }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Item", item.item_code, "ifw_location")|replace("|", " |
") }} 		{% for b in frappe.db.get_list('Sales Order Item', [['item_code', '=' , item.item_code],['docstatus', '!=' , 2]],['parent','qty','delivered_qty']) %} {%if b.qty > b.delivered_qty%} {{ b.parent }} | {% endif %} {% endfor %}

Total Qty      {{doc.total_qty}}
